custom-sql.sql: SELECT categorydataid as masterdataid ,'C-'||categorydataid as referenceid, categoryvalue as value , 'C-'||categoryvalue as code_ FROM category;
SELECT subcategorydataid as masterdataid , subcategoryvalue as value , 'SC-'||subcategoryvalue as code_ , 'SC-'||subcategorydataid as referenceid FROM subcategory where categoryid = ? ;
SELECT typeid as masterdataid ,'C-'||typeid as referenceid, 'C-'||typevalue as code_, typevalue as value FROM type;
SELECT deliverymodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||deliverymodeid as referenceid, 'C-'||deliverymodevalue as code_, deliverymodevalue as value FROM deliverymode;
SELECT filecodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||filecodeid as referenceid, 'C-'||filecodevalue as code_, filecodevalue as value FROM filecode;
SELECT basicheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheaddataid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value , basicheadcode as code_ FROM basichead;
SELECT primaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheaddataid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value , primaryheadcode as code_ FROM primaryhead where basicheaddataid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||secondaryheaddataid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value , secondaryheadcode as code_ FROM secondaryhead where primaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT teritaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||teritaryheaddataid as referenceid , tertiaryheadvalue as value , tertiaryheadcode as code_ FROM tertiaryhead where secondaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT organizationdataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||organizationdataid as referenceid , organizationvalue as value , organizationcode as code_ FROM organization ;

SELECT suborganizationdataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||suborganizationdataid as referenceid ,'C-'||suborganizationvalue as code_ , suborganizationvalue as value FROM suborganization where organizationdataid = ?;
SELECT receiptcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptcategorydataid as referenceid , 'C-'||receiptcategoryvalue as code_ , receiptcategoryvalue as value FROM receiptcategory;

SELECT receiptcategorydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptcategorydataid as referenceid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategoryvalue as code_ , receiptsubcategoryvalue as value FROM receiptsubcategory where receiptcategorydataid = ?;
SELECT countrydataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||countrydataid as referenceid , countryvalue as value , countrycode as code_ FROM country ;
SELECT statedataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||statedataid as referenceid , statecode as code_ ,statevalue as value FROM state where countrydataid = ?;
SELECT basicheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheaddataid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value , basicheadcode as code_ FROM basichead where basicheaddataid = ? ;
SELECT primaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheaddataid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value , primaryheadcode as code_ FROM primaryhead where primaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||secondaryheaddataid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value , secondaryheadcode as code_ FROM secondaryhead where secondaryheaddataid = ?;
SELECT tertiaryheaddataid as masterdataid , 'C-'||tertiaryheaddataid as referenceid , tertiaryheadvalue as value , tertiaryheadcode as code_ FROM tertiaryhead where tertiaryheaddataid = ?;
